context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
story_block_1: You search the cars for food, you search three without success, but in the glove compartment of the fourth you find a box of crackers.
story_block_2: They remind you of when you needed to eat a bland diet after your operation. You pat yourself on where you remember the incision was made. The scar healed long ago, but the brain remembers. The crackers weren't very nutritious, but some fuel in the tank is better than none.

context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
story_block_1: It looks like the store has been ransacked and all the shelves are empty. You manage to find a package of granola bars and a flashlight behind the counter.
story_block_2: It tastes just like a granola bar you enjoyed when you were younger. In an instant, you are transported to a school hiking trip. Your mind is awash by the mountain air and the bundles of sticks and leaves that formed the trail. Those days seem so long ago now...

context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
story_block_1: You go after him. As you try and stand up though you realize you're in extreme pain. You think one of your ribs is broken. You manage to get yourself on your feet, but realize catching him is impossible.
previous_action: look for something to wrap your chest with.
story_block_2: There's nothing around, so you resort to taking off your pants and wrapping it around your chest. There's a mild draft right now...

context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
story_block_1: You break the rest of the glass in the window and try to carefully crawl through. You cut yourself on the edges as you're climbing in, but you make it inside.
story_block_2: You find meat in the fridge that looks like it's gone bad. You also find a can of peas in the bottom of the pantry.
